name: web-search
description: Search webpages and get a specific page of results (each page has ~10 results). Optionally filter by site and timeframe.

query_text.description: Plain text to search for (no Google operators plain text only - use other parameters for site/date filtering)

site.description: Limit search to specific domain (e.g. 'github.com' or 'docs.python.org')

timeframe.description: Time range filter (h=hour, d=day, w=week, m=month, y=year)

pageNumber.description: Which page of results to fetch (1-5). Each page contains ~10 results

name: web_fetch
description:
Extract readable text content from a webpage using Chrome browser automation.

Key Features:
- Returns main content text and optionally links

url.description: Webpage URL to fetch (must include http:// or https://)

includeLinks.description: Whether to include extracted links in the output
